website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for homeschoolers or small offices with occasional binding needs.
pros: Can bind books of up to 450 pages
Great price point for occasional users
Neat holes to make inserting the coil easy
Once you figure out how the machine binds, operation is smooth
cons: Instructions don’t do a good job of explaining how to bind
Paper size limited to A4 or smaller

customer_reviews.title: Makesure handle is attached the correct way!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars providing the manual was more precise. The first thing I did wrong was attaching the handle..Once the handle is not correctly screwed on, the holes won't punch and the bind combs would not open. So before you get frustrated like I did, makesure you put on the handle the correct way. But the binder works good; looks a bit cheap but can do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions that come with this suck. Figuring out how to punch the holes is easy enough but trying to figure out how to actually bind the papers on the binder comb is not. There were no instructions at all. It seems to be made well but I don't like the teeth just sticking up. This machine takes up a lot of room as it is big and bulky and the teeth can be dangerous around little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Better than all current GBC binders being sold
customer_reviews.text: I give it 5 stars for doing what it does in manner exactly as advertised. Only improvement I wish it had is ability to turn off punches at ends for neater presentation. I bought this item because it’s the closest I could find to my old GBC binder with adjustable stops and I needed a second binder for remote office. Original GBC binder still going strong after 40 years, and I hope this one lasts a long time too
customer_reviews.author: ovalhed

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: I worked st a print center when I was younger and used an expensive version of these machines. This one works really good, it’s really user friendly and mine gets tossed around a bit and hasn’t broken so I’m quite pleased with is durability. The only thing you have to watch out for is bending the metal points on top, but the one I bent back bent into place again very easily. The handle is removable which makes storage much easier
customer_reviews.author: influence peddler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t punch all the way through...
customer_reviews.text: It was working great but after some hole punching it started clicking and not all the holes are being punched really unfortunate I was only punching three pages at a time....
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: once you figure it out, it works great
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few tries to figure this out, especially how to put the combs into the paper. The instructions aren't very clear. But once you figure it out, it works great. I did have to tweak the paper sizing guard so that it would work for American printer paper but it wasn't that bad to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Harpel

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any college student
customer_reviews.text: Does the job you expect. I'm a a college student and I hate the standard thin sheets of paper which bleeds with my favorite pens. I bought this a few weeks ago and began making journals for myself using cardstock paper. Soon after friends of mine asked me to make them journals for Christmas. The hole punch is consistent, quick and easy to use. I also print out papers and class work and use this machine for organizing and storing my work.
customer_reviews.author: christopher Baluja

customer_reviews.title: Performed the job I wanted done.
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to put together a number of family history books, 6 books, 25 sheets per book plus cover and backing., it is a light duty machine but for the price and occasional usage it will receive it was well worth it and performed very well. Also received 2 different size combs with the unit, 1/4" and 1/2", I only used the 1/2", the 1/4" are hard to use and only good for a few sheets of paper with a cover and backing.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Best price and works extremely well if your not a commercial user! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of price! Don't let the price fool you. This binder works extremely well. If you are binding thousands of books then maybe you need a commercial model. I needed to bind about 50 books and then a few here and there later. I was totally floor at how well it works and thought I should take the time to give them a five star review!
customer_reviews.author: Compleat Gamester Inc.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend a heavier duty unit
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on doing a lot of binding, I would recommend a heavier duty unit. I don't believe this would last through a lot of cutting. For what I needed this for, it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paper jams easily. Does not punch holes.
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money!!! I put in 7 sheets of normal printer paper to test it out and it jammed right away. Even worse though was that the handle would hit the counter every time I tried to make the holes causing me to have to rock the device backwards just to punch the holes. Who wants to have to do that? Lame product! Then I tipped it upside down and many of the metal prongs were jammed inward. They should look like the 2 prongs on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price! I use it all of the time for my home schooling! I absolutely recommend this. I have bound so many books, and it is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Works well, would order again! Need to even out pages at the bottom of the 8.5 by 11 for the spines to fit properly, but that's a part of doing this properly.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: We made family calendars for Christmas. It did the job we bought it for, instead paying someone. I wish it would punch more papers.
customer_reviews.author: GMC

customer_reviews.title: Great producr
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and works perfectly. Do not overload and it will do anything nbn g.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Brittjr

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work perfectly fine for me right now. Enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to operate and fun to use to put our ...
customer_reviews.text: So smooth, easy to operate and fun to use to put our reunion booklet together.Great!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: efficient item
customer_reviews.text: i like it but must be handle with much care
customer_reviews.author: Javier Lustgarten

customer_reviews.title: Broken and left oil on my paper
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. It worked once and then it was unusable. The one time it punched holes it left oil/grease on the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: WELL THE ONLY COMPLAINT IS THAT I HAD TO FIGURE WHERE I WANTED TO LAY MY PAPER FOR THE HOLE TO PUNCH IN THE RIGHT SPOT. I BASICALLY HAD TO MARK A SPOT FOR CONSISTENCY HOLE PUNCHING.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Not worth Dime!
customer_reviews.text: One punch has been broken in a week. Really disappointed. I didn't know it was 'made in China' in the first place. I think it's an imitation of Japanese or Korean made or something.
customer_reviews.author: tenach

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: My mother uses it to put together calendars that she has made. At 95 years old she has no problems using it.
customer_reviews.author: Birchcrossing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This gem is awesome!! I was able to use it right out of the box thanks !!
customer_reviews.author: Cinderella, Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Once figured out directions and practiced a little bit, very easy to use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works just like I hoped it would for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Spuregon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work
customer_reviews.text: Bought to bind the family recipie books I printed. This is so affordable and works super easy. I will be getting a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Chrestler

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: its doing the job I wanted, price was there, happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Agustin Bracero

customer_reviews.title: Product is complete trash
customer_reviews.text: Product is complete trash. does not work. construction is poor. sorry I ever purchased this product. Do not buy this item. The binder is obviously built for metric combs. Even with metric combs it does not work properly. I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN WALTER

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. It’s cheap and ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It’s cheap and does an ok job, but I will definitely be upgrading soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sara L Schemmel

customer_reviews.title: Church Directories
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, got the job done in two days, with a lot of work. I had a blast working with it. Can’t wait for my next big project. Yes
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Crumpler

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Not impressive but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Not impressive but does the job. Its capacity is 12 pages, don't even try to do 13 pages at a time. It will ruin your project
customer_reviews.author: Saso

customer_reviews.title: Once I figured that out it was good.
customer_reviews.text: The directions were not very clear on how to open the comb and place the document. Once I figured that out it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Alston

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product came defective and had to ship it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Almanzar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item would not work correctly could not get it to bond anything, only punch holes.
customer_reviews.author: Norene

customer_reviews.title: Can't apply the spines
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't clearly explain how to apply the spines once the holes are punched. I still haven't been able to apply the spines so this has been useless to me except for punching holes
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: It sucks!! It doesn't work at all... returning it. Waste of my time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: YaeKoo 21-Hole 450 Sheets Paper Comb Punch Binder Binding Machine Scrapbook
product_meta.description:
It Is A Superior Comb Binding Binder Machine. 
Help You Punch And Bind Up Reports, Essay Papers,Files Efficiently.
Furthermore, It Can Easily Split The Combs From Documents In Seconds. 
Unique Elegant Tone Eliminates Boring And Tedious Coordinating Time! 
This Smart Comb Binding Machine Is Suitable For Office Or Home Use.

★Carton Size:17 X 12X7 Inch
★Weight:3.7Kg
★Blinding Capacity:450Sheets(25mm Ring)
★Punching Capacity:12 Sheets(80g)
★Max Paper Size:A4
★Margin Adjustable Range:2.5/4.5/6.5mm
★Number Ofholes:21 Holes 3 X 8mm Rectangle
feature_bullets: The Max Punching Ability:12 Pages(80g),PVC 3 Sheets
The Max Blinding Ability:450 Pages(25mm Plastic Comb)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars157 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
